title: Hospitality Practical Competency Enhancement: Storytelling-Based Microlearning Design for Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Three storytelling techniques can be applied to effectively integrate scientific concepts into narratives
Learners can design 10-minute microlearning content in mobile environments with a storytelling structure
Learners develop science education scenarios reflecting the ARCS model (Attention, Relevance, Confidence, Satisfaction)
Learners can validate the validity of storytelling-based assessments through peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
